export default function Mission(){ return(
About our foundetion

We Are In A Mission To Help Helpless

Our mission is to create a world where giving back is easy, efficient, and impactful. We strive to connect charities and individuals in need with passionate donors who want to make a difference in their communities and beyond. By fostering a culture of generosity and empathy, we aim to empower individuals to create positive change and make a meaningful impact on the world

Join us today and be part of our mission to help helpless.

About US
); }
